freelancers.no_auth_freelancers: It seems that the categories that your freelance profiles have have been deactivated or deleted.

roles.administrator_description: The administrator role is acquired through another administrator, and is lost when the user or another administrator deletes the role. This role has the possibility to access: all users, all profiles, both freelancer and company, and modify their information and projects, you can also suspend, rehabilitate, and even delete them.
roles.company_description: The company role is acquired when creating a company profile, and is lost when deleting the company profile. It allows the user to access the administration panel of his company, create his own projects, modify them, activate them, deactivate them and delete them. You will also be able to see, accept and cancel the offers that freelancers send to your project, and finalize, cancel and evaluate the work of freelancers whose offers to your projects have been previously accepted.
roles.freelancer_description: The freelancer role is acquired by creating the user's first profile as a freelancer, and is lost by deleting the user's last profile as a freelancer. It allows the user to access the management panel of their freelancers, modify, deactivate, activate and delete one of their freelance profiles, create offers on projects in their category, and access to work on the projects.
roles.explanation: The role table groups all the roles available in the application, as well as the process by which they are obtained or lost, and the description of the functions that they allow access.

projects.deposit_info: The deposit will be used as an alliance, so that no independent professional loses their time, likewise, each independent professional also makes a deposit, so that you do not lose yours either. At the end of the project, the amount deposited will be returned to you.

offers.you_need_a_freelancer_profile: You need an independent professional profile in one of the categories of this project to be able to make an offer
offers.aprox_total_price_paid: Approximate total price paid as a deposit
offers.no_in_progress_offers: There are no in progress offers
offers.accepted: Offer correctly accepted, now its the time of the freelancer to accept it
offers.want_to_accept: Payment of the amount estimated by the freelancer will be made as a deposit, at the end of the project, in case that amount ends up being greater, you must pay the difference, and in case of less, the corresponding part will be returned.
offers.want_to_cancel: The offer will be canceled, refunding the amount of the deposit on your balance. Later, you can accept this offer again as long as the freelancer does not delete it.
offers.cancelled: Offer successfully canceled, the deposit amount has been refunded to your balance
offers.want_to_take: The payment of 20% of the amount estimated in the offer will be made as a deposit, at the end of the project, the deposit will be reimbursed.
offers.refuse_project_text: The project will be rejected, the company may accept your offer again, but after this rejection they may not be interested. Try to talk to the company before, they may give you a little more time to start working in the project.
offers.taken: The project has been taken. You can update the number of hours you dedicate to work from this section. When the company marks your work as completed, you will receive the collection and refund of the deposit

company.accept: Hello, we have seen your offer for our project "{{title}}", and we have decided to accept it! üéâüéâ. We are waiting for you to take the project. You can take it from
company.cancel: Hello, we are sorry to say that we have thought better of our decision to accept your offer for the project "{{title}}". Good luck! üçÄ.

freelancer.accept: Hello, I have decided to take the project "{{title}}", it is already running! üòÉ
freelancer.refuse: Hello, I have decided that it is not the best time to take the project "{{title}}", I hope you understand my position. Good luck! üçÄ.

offers.finished_project: This project is finished and does not accept offers

jobs.finish: The work will be marked as completed, and payment will be made to the freelancer. The amount to be paid will be the estimated hourly price in the offer, multiplied by the number of hours worked by the freelancer. If this price exceeds the initial total price, an extra payment will be required, if it is less, a refund of the difference will be made.
jobs.correctly_finished: The job has been marked as completed successfully
jobs.hours_error: The number of hours must be at least 1. Please contact the freelancer for updates
jobs.cancel_text_company: Canceling the job assumes that the freelancer has lost time in this job, so you will be penalized with 20% of the deposit price given
jobs.cancel_text_freelancer: Canceling the job assumes that the company has lost its time, so you will be penalized with 100% of the deposit given

company.canceled: Hello, we are sorry to say that we have decided to cancel your work on the project "{{title}}". Good luck!. üçÄ
company.finished: Hello, we have marked your job in our project "{{title}}" as finished!. OkFreelancers will manage your payment. Nice job! üòÉ

freelancer.canceled: Hello, I have decided to cancel my work on the project "{{title}}", I hope you understand my position. Good luck!. üçÄ
